

GENERAL ORDER No, 27/1916.]
[Private and Confidential. —Not for Publication
NEW ZEALAND EXPEDITIONARY FORCE.
BOOK XIV.
LIST OF CASUALTIES
AND A
SUMMARY OF CASUALTIES
IN ORDER OF UNITS
Reported from the 15th August, 1918, to the 6th January, 1919.
ALSO INCLUDING A COMPLETE
SUMMARY OF ALL CASUALTIES
IN THEIR RESPECTIVE UNITS
Up to and including 6th January, 1919.
WELLINGTON.
BY AUTHORITY: MARCUS F. MARKS, GOVERNMENT PRINTER.
1919.
